title: MSBuild /help should link to docs
body:
Somewhere in the output of `msbuild /help` we should put a link to https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/visualstudio/msbuild/msbuild.

(Thanks for the suggestion, @whoisj: https://github.com/Microsoft/msbuild/issues/2887#issuecomment-359844657.)
